tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: X FACTOR - Lucy Spraggan's audition - BEER FEAR / LAST NIGHT (Full version | best quality | HD)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: INTERVIEW WITH RITA ORA DISCUSSING SONG, NOT SHOWN ON TELEVISION. X FACTOR - LUCY - BEER FEAR (Full version, best quality, HD + INTERVIEW WITH RITA ORA) Simon Cowell

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: 73 people are alcoholics﻿ :P
srsly? commenting something like that under your own﻿ vid.. that's just weak man
Thought it was pretty cringe to﻿ be honest!
She has a Kate Nash/ Lily Allen﻿ vibe too her. Hope she does well.
your stupid﻿ -.-
to anyone saying how original this is,﻿ look up kate nash foundations. although this song is funny at times, her voice is average at best
I love this song!!﻿
kate nash?﻿
A) STOP HATING WHAT I DONT HATE B) Language was made to communicate, not so you could win an argument. If you knew what he meant his sentence﻿ was semantically correct.
My names cassie im 21 I'm very sick and trying to fufil a last wish. Please watch my video ﻿
thats a fucking stupid﻿ comment
This﻿ song is awesome!
i dont﻿ drink still like this song so f*ck you
Алкаши﻿ мы крч
This songs funny as can't stop watching﻿ it
Her style reminds me of Bare Naked﻿ Ladies
wooooww chill﻿ out mayn
no im pretty sure its G C D C over and over, this song just﻿ has a capo on a high fret so it sounds easier with her voice
Just chill out and give the girl credit where it's due﻿ !
Love﻿ you

Reviewer.Books: I read lots on holiday ghfneifniebfr
Reviewer.Movies: old ones are better e.g. godfather, indiana jones
Reviewer.Music: nirvana, led zepplin, hendrix, and other great artist that dont produce autotuned horseshit
